name: hue-saturation-relative-luminance
description: Allows you to control Hue, Saturation, and Relative Luminance as if it where a color space. Inputs are the Hue, Saturation, and Relative Luminance of a color, and output is an array of RGB values ranging from 0 to 1, 0 to 255, and a string containing the hex code.
author: Gidostink
